ISSUE.TITLE: css problems
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I just installed drone through the .deb-Package. Everything seems to work except for the interface UI. ![screenshot 2015-10-01 12 30 29](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/5519491/10218871/98d9be40-683a-11e5-8e48-425fdbdfdded.png) I looked in the chrome developer tools and any resources seems to be loaded correctly. Any ideas on how to fix it?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Further optimization for prod build - split shared libs into invididual chunks (#1221)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: added git FS; removed clone from generate pipeline (#1219)
